snippet.title: CyberTaxi: Lunatic Nights - Early Access Date Reveal
snippet.description:
CyberTaxi: Lunatic Nights on Steam - Play the demo now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2927000/CyberTaxi_Lunatic_Nights/

Cybertaxi: Lunatic Nights Early Access coming March 4th.

CyberTaxi: Lunatic Nights is a dystopian taxi driving simulator set in a dark and violent city. In the game, you must upgrade, repair and fuel your cab to complete increasingly difficult passenger missions. You will also need to arm your cab to face local gangs and armed road users. At any point in the game, you can leave your cab and explore the city on foot, armed with firearms and melee weapons.

Media/business inquiries: hedmediagames@gmail.com
